projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: The website you're looking at! A personal project used to learn react and show off my projects and interests.

projects.name: Cinemate
projects.description: A mock movie-theater ticket booking website with a database backend. Features a login system, movie listings, and a cart system.

projects.name: Java Database Controller
projects.description: Java Swing GUI used to connect to a MySQL server and display databases. Has a function to remove or add elements, as well as a query box.
